column3: input file for the turbine specifications
input file for the point probes
input file for the line probes
initial turbulence intensity, also used for the ABL inlet
X flow speed vector for the ABL inlet BC
Y flow speed vector for the ABL inlet BC
Z flow speed vector for the ABL inlet BC
sand grain roughness for rough wall, or ABL
reference height for the ABL reference velocity
number of times to repeat the pre-cursor simulation
number of times to update the rotor speeds
target cell size for the “base” mesh
target size for the no-slip rough wall (seabed)
thickness of first prism layer next to the wall
total thickness of the prismatic cell layers
maximum size ratio of connected mesh edges
specifies the cell transition from boundaries to the core mesh (range is 1 to 2)
> 1 gives more cells, < 1 gives fewer cells
> 1 gives faster growth, < 1 gives slower growth
